title: Ministry of Education, University and Research
summary: The Ministry of Education, University and Research (in Italian: Ministero dell'Istruzione, dell'Universit√† e della Ricerca or MIUR) is the ministry of the Italian government for the national education system, the Italian universities and research agencies.  The current Italian Minister of Public Education is Patrizio Bianchi and the Italian Minister of University and Research is Maria Cristina Messa.
